item.title: Social Media Content Editor/Repurposing - Upwork
item.description:
We’re looking for someone to help us repurpose our existing podcast, blog and youtube content into engaging social media posts.

This position will require you to think creatively, work independently and have the availability for quick turnaround times.

You’ll need to speak English fluently, have image design (ideally canva) expertise, basic video editing skills (creating reels/shorts), and have a strong grasp of the types of content working on social media.

Our ideal candidate will be able to use a combination of prompts and AI generated ideas to take the longer form content and make it into visually appealing social posts.

Here is an example workflow we’d love to use to illustrate what we’re looking for….

1. After our audio-only podcast episode is finished editing, you’ll get an automated notification with links to all the content.

2. You’ll retrieve the audio file and upload it to some form of AI (GPT, Castmagic, Descript) to get ideas for carousels, tweet threads, and other formats that will perform well on social.

3. Based on the outputs, you’ll decide which format would work best. This is where you’ll need to think independently since different types of episodes will lend themselves to performing better with different formats. You’ll need to decide what the best format will be.

4. Using the AI responses as a guide, you’ll start creating the images and crafting the captions/text. This will require creativity and also strong English skills since AI content usually needs to be modified.

5. Once all the content is created, you’ll upload to the appropriate folders/locations and update our databases.

This is a general example of what we’re looking for. For each content-type we’ll have slightly different instructions (i.e. youtube videos will require creating shorts and reels) but the overall production flow will be similar.

We’ll be looking to create 4-6 pieces of content each week (podcast, youtube, blog, social prompts).

We’ll consider all applicants and then choose 2-4 people to move to the next round where we will have you do a paid test run.

If you have experience performing a very similar role, please highlight this in your application (links are super helpful). Likewise, if you have specific experience in the running/endurance training world, mention this in your application.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00

item.title: Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are seeking a creative and skilled Video Creator to join our dynamic marketing team at [Your IT Firm]. As a Video Creator, you will play a crucial role in developing compelling visual content that promotes our products and services across various platforms. Your work will be instrumental in enhancing our brand's visibility and driving engagement with our target audience.

Responsibilities:

1.) Conceptualization and Storyboarding:
    a) Collaborate with marketing and creative teams to brainstorm ideas and develop concepts for video advertisements.
    b) Create detailed storyboards that outline the visual narrative, shot sequences, and transitions.

2.) Video Production:
    a) Capture high-quality video footage using cameras and other equipment.
    b) Direct actors and contributors during filming to ensure the desired outcome.
    c) Manage lighting, sound, and other technical aspects of video production.

3.) Editing and Post-Production:
    a) Edit raw footage to create seamless and engaging video content.
    b) Enhance video and audio quality using editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
    c) Incorporate graphics, animations, and special effects as needed.

4.) Optimization and Distribution:
    a) Format videos for different platforms (e.g., social media, website, email campaigns) to maximize reach and engagement.
    b) Collaborate with the digital marketing team to optimize videos for SEO and audience targeting.
    c) Monitor and analyze video performance metrics to refine strategies and improve future content.

5.) Compliance and Quality Assurance:
    a) Ensure all video content complies with brand guidelines, legal requirements, and industry standards.
    b) Conduct quality checks to maintain high standards of visual and audio production.

Requirements:

1.) Proven experience as a Video Creator, Videographer, or similar role, preferably within the IT or tech industry.
2.) Proficiency in video editing software and tools, such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, or similar programs.
3.) Strong understanding of cinematography, lighting, audio recording, and video production techniques.
4.) Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas and concepts.
5.) Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
6.) Strong attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently under deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:

1.) Portfolio showcasing previous video projects, including advertisements or promotional content.
2.) Knowledge of current trends in digital marketing and video production.

item.description:
We are looking for a skilled audio engineer or music producer to create a comprehensive video tutorial on how to transfer Drum patterns from a BOSS Dr-880 drum machine to a Maschine MK3. The tutorial should cover the entire process of transferring patterns in one go, rather than instrument by instrument.

Requirements:

- BOSS Dr-880 and Maschine MK3 expertise: The candidate should have hands-on experience with both devices and be familiar with their respective interfaces and functions.
- Video production skills: The candidate should be able to create a clear, concise, and visually appealing video tutorial that effectively communicates the transfer process.
- Audio engineering knowledge: A basic understanding of audio engineering principles and terminology is necessary to ensure the tutorial is accurate and easy to follow.

Deliverables:

- A good quality video tutorial (approximately 15-30 minutes long that covers the entire process of transferring patterns from a BOSS Dr-880 to a Maschine MK3.
- A detailed script outlining the steps and procedures for the tutorial.
- Any necessary software or equipment required for the tutorial.
